Test Name: HER2 Immunohistochemistry (IHC) with reflex FISH, Breast
Purpose: Semi-quantitative assessment of HER2 receptor status in breast carcinoma to guide patient management, with FISH reflex testing for equivocal IHC results.
Container: Paraffin block (formalin-fixed tissue) or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Automated or manual IHC staining system and fluorescence microscope for FISH analysis
